ModMetaData.name: Allow Right Click Work Outside Zone 允许右键可以在工作区外工作
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
When pawns were selected, right click on work givers won't allow us to work outside allowed zone. This usually means we will have to change the allowed zone, wait for pawns to finish their work, and then change the allowed zone back. It could be very dangerous and very annoying.
This mod allows pawns to work outside allowed zone when right clicking on work givers without the need to change the allowed zone. It's aim is to improve the quality of life for players for occasional work outside allowed zone.
当选中小人/机械体时，右键点击可指派工作的地点时，殖民者不能在允许区域外工作。 这通常意味着我们需要更改活动区，等待小人完成工作，然后再将活动区改回去。 这可能非常危险，也非常烦人。
这个模组允许小人在右键点击工作指派点时在活动区外工作，而无需更改活动区。 它的目的是改善玩家在偶尔需要在活动区外工作时的游戏体验。
